description: The cheesy and nutty crumb enhances the salmon flavours.
keywords: Fish dishes,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free
name: Pan Fried Salmon with a Macadamia & Cheese Crumb Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 salmon fillets, 180g each, scaled and boned
1 medium lemon, halved and pips removed

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Melt the butter on a pan for 2 minutes and add the breadcrumbs and combine fully and then set to one side.
Now add the grated parmesan and crushed nuts to the same container. Place the salmon skin side down on a baking tray and cover with the mixture evenly.
Bake in the oven 20 minutes and then remove from the heat. Season with salt and pepper before serving with a wedge of lemon and a choice of sides.
